title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API; includes built-in model library and Docker images.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API; chat, embed, pull, list models in ~5 lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter giving Ollama models first-class support for chat, tools, embeddings, retrieval.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; folders, share links, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builders, streaming, async, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, embed, pull, delete.

title: ollama-cli (ggo/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust TUI client with syntax highlighting, conversation history, and key-bindings like nano.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model; zero-config drop-in.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chat (jacoblee/ollama-chat)
summary: Minimal Next.js chat template that streams Ollama responses; useful for quick internal demos.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client with async IEnumerable streaming and nullable ref-types.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines; cache models across runs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama models act as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag (mneedham/ollama-rag)
summary: End-to-end RAG example using Ollama + LangChain + Chroma; ingests PDFs and answers questions offline.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama with async/await, SSE parsing, and nimble package distribution.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into guild chats with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize notes, brainstorm, or Q&A against local Ollama models.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to declaratively pull models and configure Ollama servers as code.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing and cross-compilation support.
